Text: Inquery re aluminium companies Cc Margaret mentioned to me that you might be able to help me with the followings We Central European Origination London office might start talking to two aluminium companies in Central Europe Before we were to meet them it would be rather useful I suppose to find out what aluminium deals if any you closed in the States The most important issue would be whether you managed to index the price of power to the price of aluminium if yes how Your help would be much appreacited Many thanks Jozsef
